price: Sesungguhnya kami telah beriman kepada Tuhan kami, agar Dia mengampuni kesalahan-kesalahan kami dan sihir yang telah kamu paksakan kepada kami melakukannya.  Dan Allah lebih baik (pahala-Nya) dan lebih kekal (azab-Nya)".
arabic: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغۡفِرَ لَنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَا وَمَآ أَكۡرَهۡتَنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحۡرِۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā āmannā birabbinā liyaghfira lanā khaṭāyānā wamā akrahtanā ʿalayhi mina al-siḥ'ri wal-lahu khayrun wa-abqā
